title: Mystic Pizza - Exarchia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pizza and pasta restaurant with 4 location. Has salads, soups, sweets, juices and coffee drinks. Uses organic hemp in recipes and drinks and offers vegetarian choices. Street name may go by Emmanouil Benaki.
